Lottery
How it work?
  • 2% of all deposits go to the total lottery pot
  • After each deposit made you automatically become a participant
  • in the lottery and receive tickets 0.05 BNB = 1 ticket
  • Maximum 100 tickets for 1 deposit
  • Every 24 hours the contract randomly selects 5 lucky tickets
  • The total pot is divided between 5 participants who have these tickets
